articles.author: Bloomberg
articles.title: Disney+ could lose 20 million subscribers after ceding IPL's digital rights - Economic Times
articles.description: The estimate, from Media Partners Asia, means the company may have trouble reaching its goal of as many of as 260 million global Disney+ subscribers by 2024, according to Vivek Couto, executive director of the research firm.
articles.content:
Walt Disney Co. could lose as many as 20 million of its Disney+ subscribers after being outbid for the streaming rights to Indian Premier League cricket matches this week.
The estimate, from Media P… [+2789 chars]
